variable.name: DFQ1
variable.description: One of the purposes of the study is: choose answer a, b, c, or d
variable.value: IF NEW DIABETES TREATMENT WILL BE PRACTICAL AND SAFE etc.(a)
IF IT IS PRACTICAL AND SAFE TO KEEP BLOOD GLUCOSE LEVELS CLOSE TO THAT OF NON-DIABETICS etc. (b)
IF I-PUMP IS AS PRACTICAL AND SAFE AS 3-4 DAILY INJECTIONS etc. (c)
IF BLODD GLUCOSE MONITORING IS AS ACCURATE AS URINE TESTING etc. (d)

variable.name: DFQ2
variable.description: Doctors specializing in the treatment of diabetes: choose answer a, b, c, or d
variable.value: HAVE PROVEN THAT KEEPING BLOOD GLUCOSE LEVELS CLOSE TO THAT OF NON-DIABETICS WILL PREVENT COMPLICATIONS etc. (a)
HAVE PROVEN THAT BLOOD GLUCOSE LEVELS ARE UNRELATED TO COMPLICATIONS etc. (b)
DO NOT AGREE THAT RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN BLOOD GLUCOSE LEVELS AND COMPLICATIONS IS PROVEN etc. (c)
BELIEVE THAT RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN BLOOD GLUCOSE LEVELS AND COMPLICATIONS IS NOT IMPORTANT etc. (d)

variable.name: DFQ3
variable.description: The experimental treatment group will receive: choose answer a, b, c, or d
variable.value: I-PUMP OR 3-4 DAILY INJECTIONS PLUS DAILY SBGM etc. (a)
I-PUMP OR 3-4 DAILY INJECTIONS PLUS DAILY URINE TESTS etc. (b)
1-2 DAILY INJECTIONS PLUS DAILY SBGM etc. (c)
1-2 DAILY INJECTIONS PLUS DAILY URINE TESTS etc. (d)

variable.name: DFQ4
variable.description: The standard treatment group will receive: choose answer a, b, c, or d
variable.value: I-PUMP OR 3-4 DAILY INJECTIONS PLUS DAILY SBGM etc. (a)
I-PUMP OR 3-4 DAILY INJECTIONS PLUS DAILY URINE TESTS etc. (b)
1-2 DAILY INJECTIONS PLUS DAILY SBGM etc. (c)
1-2 DAILY INJECTIONS PLUS DAILY URINE TESTS etc. (d)

variable.name: DFQ5
variable.description: Random assignment means: choose answer a, b, c, or d
variable.value: EQUAL CHANCE OF PLACEMENT INTO EITHER TREATMENT GROUP etc. (a)
ASSIGNMENT TO BEST TREATMENT GROUP etc. (d)

variable.name: DFQ6
variable.description: If I volunteer for this study, I will be expected to participate for possibly: choose answer a, b, c, or d

variable.name: DFQ7
variable.description: Which is not expected if you choose to participate: choose answer a, b, c, or d
variable.value: TO CHOOSE BETWEEN STANDARD OR EXPERIMENTAL TREATMENT GROUP etc. (a)
TO STAY IN ASSIGNED TREATMENT GROUP etc. (b)
TO KEEP CLINIC APPOINTMENT AND HOME RECORDS etc. (c)
TO AVOID PREGNANCY IN NEXT 2 YEARS etc. (d)

variable.name: DFQ8
variable.description: Compared to current treatment, participation in the experimental group will: choose answer a, b, c, or d
variable.value: INCREASE NUMBER/SEVERITY OF HYPOGLYCEMIC REACTIONS etc. (a)
INCREASE RISK - IF ON PUMP - OF HIGH BLOOD SUGAR LEVELS etc. (b)
INCREASE RISK - IF ON PUMP - OF INFECTIONS etc. (c)

variable.name: DFQ9
variable.description: Compared to current treatment, participation in the standard group will: choose answer a, b, c, or d
variable.value: INCREASE RISK OF HIGH BLOOD SUGAR etc. (b)
INCREASE RISK OF LOW BLOOD SUGAR etc. (c)

variable.name: DFQ10
variable.description: Standard group assignment would include center visits every: choose answer a, b, c, or d

variable.name: DFQ11
variable.description: Experimental group assignment would include center visits every: choose answer a, b, c, or d

variable.name: DFQ12
variable.description: A potential risk of fluorescein angiography is: choose answer a, b, c, or d

variable.name: DFQ13
variable.description: Which diabetes complication will not be measured: choose answer a, b, c, or d

variable.name: DFQ14
variable.description: If I am assigned to the experimental group I can expect initial hospitalization: choose answer a, b, c, or d

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value
